title: Fix photos app
body: So far i have tried three different apps and I cannot access my pre windows phone 8.1 photos. This needs fixing as a number 1 priority.

comments.body: please restore the previous version of the Photo app - it was very good.  This version has lost some excellent features like highlights and shadows and now is probably quite good for family "happy snaps" , but sadly, not good for other photos.  Also compulsory Albums are not helpful.
